attributes.action: keep the existing funding for Seashells Childrens Nursery
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In March, the Prime Minister praised Seashells Nursery in Sheerness as a centre of excellence. However, the governemt are now cutting the funding by £500,000, and they are having to lose many members of staff.This petition is to let the Prime Minister know that we will not give up our Nursery, and wish  the funding to continue and perhaps increase, as this centre is vital to the island of Sheppey's economy
